content: S-BT-MF HL Threaded stud Threaded screw-in stud (multilayer coated carbon steel - corrosion protection comparable to HDG) for multi-purpose fastenings on steel in mildly corrosive environments ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Threaded studs & standoffs- - - ### FEATURES:Features The S-BT MF is easier and more reliable – no electric supply cords or heavy equipment needed for installation Suitable for use in mildly corrosive environments (C3) on coated steel Easy installation in tight spaces No rework necessary on coated steel Compatible with Hilti MT installation channels Applications General fastenings on steel structure with a thickness of 6 mm (1/4) and greater Fastening cable ladders using channels or hold-down/expansion guide clips Fastening cable trays and cable runs using channels or conduit clips Fastening junction boxes, switchgear and instrumentation panels directly or using channels Fastening lighting fixtures, signage etc. For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Point type: Blunt tip Base materials: Steel Corrosion protection: Duplex coating equivalent to 45 µm hot dipped galvanized Technical Data | Point type | Blunt tip | Base materials | Steel | Corrosion protection | Duplex coating equivalent to 45 µm hot dipped galvanized | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2345768 - Threaded stud S-BT-MF M8/7 AN 6 HL - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x S-BT-xF M8/7 AN 6 HL Threaded stud - 0.01x TS-BT 5.3-65 S Stepped drill bit - 2346061 - Threaded stud S-BT-MF W10/15 AN 6 HL - Package Size 100 pc Package Contents: - 1x S-BT-xF W10/15 AN 6 HL Threaded stud - 0.01x TS-BT 5.3-65 S Stepped drill bit
